entry.title: WIND WARNING , Victoria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 2:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 10.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: 3.6°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near Haro Strait late this afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near Haro Strait early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 this evening then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
